alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 3:50PM EDT until October 12 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wayne County in south central Kentucky... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 348 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Albany, or 16 miles north of Byrdstown, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cabell around 400 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Parnell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
